flac.title: Record in FLAC
flac.desc: Recording directly to FLAC will make your audio almost identical to recording people individually.
flac.disabled: Your server does not have the FLAC mode feature. Become a patron to use this feature.

continuous.title: Continuous Mode
continuous.desc: Disable VAD and record everything your microphone picks up.
continuous.disabled: Your server does not have the continuous mode feature. Become a patron to use this feature.

nr.title: Noise Suppression
nr.desc: Suppresses background noise from your microphone. You can change this during recording.

errors.notFound: This recording was not found. Make sure your recording has the webapp enabled.
errors.invalidKey: The webapp key to this recording is invalid.

onboarding.recordDesc: Join the recording session as a user
onboarding.monitorDesc: Check when people are being recorded

noAudio.title: I can't use your microphone!
noAudio.desc: Click the icon next to the URL bar, enable the microphone permission, and reload the page.

errors.audioPerm: Error while requesting for audio permission

modal.disconnectedBody: Your connection to the server was lost.

errors.CLOSED: The connection to the server was closed.
errors.INVALID: The server couldn't process our data somehow!
errors.INVALID_MESSAGE: The server couldn't process our data somehow!
errors.INVALID_ID: The ID sent to the server was invalid!
errors.INVALID_FLAGS: The flags sent to the server was invalid!
errors.INVALID_TOKEN: The token sent to the server was invalid!
errors.INVALID_USERNAME: The username sent to the server was invalid!
errors.INVALID_CONNECTION_TYPE: The connection type sent to the server was invalid!
errors.NOT_FOUND: The recording no longer is connected to the server!
errors.ALREADY_CONNECTED: Too many people are connected to this recording!
